headline: A Look At Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Valuation As GHOST Energy Deal Reshapes Its Growth Strategy
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) is in the spotlight after acquiring a majority stake in GHOST Energy, a move that reshapes its presence in functional and energy drinks and raises fresh questions about the stock’s long term profile. See our latest analysis for Keurig Dr Pepper. The GHOST deal lands at a time when Keurig Dr Pepper’s 1 year total shareholder return of 8.08% and 3 year total shareholder return of 13.05% contrast with a softer 90 day share price return of 5.03% and a recent close at...
